comments:
Build 20030304

In a self-hosting workspace, I deleted shared projects jdt/core (+tests), then 
added them back from repository, and discarded on of them (again). I noticed 
the following dump in the .log.

Looks like the underlying IFile was gone.

I can reproduce this by having more than one shared config in the launch 
history and then delete the project containing the configs. The problem is that 
we receive notifications one by one as configs are removed, so we try to 
retrieve a memento for a deleted config, which fails.

Fixed. Check for null file in LaunchConfiguration#getMemento (and throw an 
exception). Updated launch history manager to check that a config exists before 
saving it into the history.
